import React, { Component } from "react"; import Avatar from "@material-ui/core/Avatar"; import moment from "moment"; import "moment/locale/fr"; import imageStudent from "../../../assets/images/supAdmin.png"; class ProfileHeader extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { user: {}, photo: imageStudent, }; } componentDidUpdate(prevProps) { if (prevProps.userProfile != this.props.userProfile) { this.setState( { user: this.props.userProfile, photo: this.props.userProfile.user.photo == null ? imageStudent : this.props.userProfile.user.photo, } ); } } render() { return (

{this.state.user.user != undefined ? this.state.user.user.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + this.state.user.user.name.slice(1) + " " + this.state.user.user.surname.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + this.state.user.user.surname.slice(1) : ""}

{this.state.user.user != undefined ? this.state.user.user.zip_code + " , " + this.state.user.user.address.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + this.state.user.user.address.slice(1) : ""}
